Interface ExerciseService

public interface ExerciseService
Description:

The interface providing services for Exercise

    getTotalExercisesCount()
    This method uses pagination to fetch the fetch the data, in page number and size format.
    void
    populateDataIfNeeded()
    This method makes request to the 3rd party api for the exercises dataset and populates the database only if sufficient number of exercises are not present in the database

  • Method Details

    • populateDataIfNeeded

      void populateDataIfNeeded()
      This method makes request to the 3rd party api for the exercises dataset and populates the database only if sufficient number of exercises are not present in the database

    • getExerciseByPage

      List<Exercise> getExerciseByPage(int page, int size)
      This method uses pagination to fetch the fetch the data, in page number and size format.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number of data to fetch from.
      size - The size of total entries to fetch.
      Returns:
      an List Exercise

    • getTotalExercisesCount

      Long getTotalExercisesCount()
      This method uses pagination to fetch the fetch the data, in page number and size format.
      Returns:
      total count of the exercise in the database.

    • getExerciseById

      Exercise getExerciseById(Long exerciseId)
      Fetches the Exercise by its numeric id.
      Parameters:
      exerciseId - the numeric id of entity Exercise
      Returns:
      an object of entity Exercise
